about_the_game:
Wisdom Watcher is the first clockpunk FPS in Virtual Reality, where you take part in epic battles against hordes of ancient demons. Equipped with a vast arsenal of weapons and magical cards, your task will be to survive and restore order in the astral universe.

Prepare to take on the role of the last pilgrim of the Wisdom Watchers and fight to avenge your fallen comrades in battle. Millennia-old legends will come to life as you confront monstrous entities inspired by European folklore within astral arenas. Only with courage, strategy, and targeted use of your resources can you hope to survive and return to the real world.

Are you ready to accept the challenge and climb the ranks on Leaderboard? Get ready for an unprecedented VR experience, where every victory will bring you closer to salvation... or eternal imprisonment. The fate of the universe is in your hands.


KEY FEATURES

UNPRECEDENTED INTENSITY WAVES IN VR


Over 40 monsters on screen simultaneously with exceptional real-time lighting.

GAMEPLAY VARIETY

20 levels of normal mode and 80 levels of hard mode for those seeking a real challenge.

COMPETITIVE LEADERBOARD AND HIDDEN OBJECTIVES

Make the game competitive by providing ever-new challenges, with a scoring system based on your ability to bring death and destruction upon your enemies.

UPGRADABLE ARSENAL OF WEAPONS


A selection of 7 unlockable weapons as you progress through the game. Whether melee or ranged, varying your arsenal and discovering the secret abilities of weapons will be crucial to facing increasingly difficult enemy waves.

EVOLVED VR QUALITY

Primarily designed for Meta Quest 2 standalone VR but also compatible with PCVR and Meta Quest 3.

CARD SYSTEM

Create your own builds tailored to your playstyle with cards that unlock passive abilities, and conquer the powers of your enemies.

DEMONS WITH ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE

Various types of monsters capable of moving around the map to make each encounter unique. Monsters also power up as the game progresses to keep the challenge intriguing. Doesn't that sound demonic?

BUILD TO DESTROY


Traps, barriers, and tricks to help you stay alive. Channel enemies, make them crash into your spikes, or give them an electric shock to stun them. The battlefield is your canvas.

CLOCKPUNK WORLD AND EUROPEAN FOLKLORE

Enter the castle of the Watchers and be guided by L.O.O.P., your robotic assistant. Discover a complex story built on direct references and reworkings of European folklore.

CONTINUOUSLY EVOLVING GAME

Wisdom Watcher is an organism in continuous evolution, and your feedback is its lifeblood! More arenas and modes are coming, so keep following us for all updates.



Wisdom Watcher continues to evolve with ongoing development, and to ensure the title perseveres to accommodate all users, community feedback is crucial and always appreciated. To reach out to the Space Whale development team directly, you can access the Discord server to become a game tester, or to express your opinion.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or above
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 or above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • VR Support: Steam VR, Meta headsets, HTC Vive
  • Additional Notes: Windows Mixed Reality NOT Supported
